long_description: Streetwise, comfortable and deceptively lightweight, the Smith Swindler polarized sunglasses sport a large lens silhouette that delivers plenty of coverage. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Black Red and Brown Herringbone frames feature brown-tint lenses that enhance your vision in a wide range of light conditions. Black Stripe frames feature gray-tint lenses, ideal for bright days and direct sunlight. Polycarbonate lenses are twenty times more impact resistant than glass and a third the weight; they're also acid- and heat-resistant. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. The Smith Swindler polarized sunglasses have a medium fit with large coverage.
short_description: Streetwise, comfortable and deceptively lightweight, the Smith Swindler polarized sunglasses sport a large lens silhouette that delivers plenty of coverage.
